metadata.description: Optional. Name of the Storage Account.
Optional. Location for all resources.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or it's fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'
Optional. Type of managed service identity.
Optional. Mandatory 'managedServiceIdentity' contains UserAssigned. The identy to assign to the resource.
Optional. Type of Storage Account to create.
Optional. Storage Account Sku Name.
Optional. Storage Account Access Tier.
Optional. Provides the identity based authentication settings for Azure Files.
Optional. Virtual Network Identifier used to create a service endpoint.
Optional. Configuration Details for private endpoints.
Optional. Networks ACLs, this value contains IPs to whitelist and/or Subnet information.
Optional. Blob service and containers to deploy
Optional. File service and shares to deploy
Optional. Queue service and queues to create.
Optional. Table service and tables to create.
Optional. Indicates whether public access is enabled for all blobs or containers in the storage account.
Optional. Set the minimum TLS version on request to storage.
Optional. If true, enables move to archive tier and auto-delete
Optional. If true, enables Hierarchical Namespace for the storage account
Optional. Set up the amount of days after which the blobs will be moved to archive tier
Optional. Set up the amount of days after which the blobs will be deleted
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Customer Usage Attribution id (GUID). This GUID must be previously registered
Generated. Do not provide a value! This date value is used to generate a SAS token to access the modules.

services.blob: [if(or(or(or(equals(parameters('storageAccountKind'), 'BlockBlobStorage'), equals(parameters('storageAccountKind'), 'BlobStorage')), equals(parameters('storageAccountKind'), 'StorageV2')), equals(parameters('storageAccountKind'), 'Storage')), json('{"enabled": true}'), json('null'))]

properties.notes: [if(equals(parameters('lock'), 'CanNotDelete'), 'Cannot delete resource or child resources.', 'Cannot modify the resource or child resources.')]

metadata.description: Required. Name of the Storage Account.
Optional. Indicates whether DeleteRetentionPolicy is enabled for the Blob service.
Optional. Indicates the number of days that the deleted blob should be retained. The minimum specified value can be 1 and the maximum value can be 365.
Optional. Automatic Snapshot is enabled if set to true.
Sets the CORS rules. You can include up to five CorsRule elements in the request.
Optional. Blob containers to create.
Required. Name of the Storage Account.
The name of the storage container to deploy
Specifies whether data in the container may be accessed publicly and the level of access.
Configure immutability policy.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or it's fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'

resources.name: default

metadata.description: Required. Name of the Storage Account.
Required. Name of the container to apply the policy to
The immutability period for the blobs in the container since the policy creation, in days.

This property can only be changed for unlocked time-based retention policies. When enabled, new blocks can be written to an append blob while maintaining immutability protection and compliance. Only new blocks can be added and any existing blocks cannot be modified or deleted. This property cannot be changed with ExtendImmutabilityPolicy API
The name of the deployed immutability policy.

immutabilityPolicyResourceId.value: [resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers/immutabilityPolicies', split(format('{0}/default/{1}/default', parameters('storageAccountName'), parameters('containerName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}/default', parameters('storageAccountName'), parameters('containerName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}/default', parameters('storageAccountName'), parameters('containerName')), '/')[2], split(format('{0}/default/{1}/default', parameters('storageAccountName'), parameters('containerName')), '/')[3])]

metadata.description: The id of the deployed immutability policy.
The resource group of the deployed immutability policy.
